```{r}
library(mvtnorm)

set.seed(2017)
simulated2 <- sim_DT_troph(states = 2, time_max = 4*60*60, delta_t = 1, start_state = 1, switch_rate = c(.005, .005), int_rate = c(.005, .02), num_locations = 1, state_tpm = matrix(c(.99, .01, .01, .99), nrow = 2, byrow = T))

simulated3 <- sim_DT_troph(states = 3, time_max = 1*60*60, delta_t = 1, start_state = 1, switch_rate = rep(.002, 6), int_rate = c(0, .06, .18), num_locations = 1, state_tpm = matrix(NA, nrow = 3, ncol = 3, byrow = T))
```

```{r two state}
n_mcmc <- 5000
tau <- matrix( c(.1, 0, 
                 0, .1), nrow = 2, ncol = 2)
gamma <- c(.005, .005)
X <- simulated$state
lambda <- c(.005, .02)
start <- list(X = X, lambda = lambda, gamma = gamma)
i <- exp(-5)

run_model <- DT_pen_mcmc(penalty = i, starts_data = simulated$inter_persec, 
                        states = 2, ant_file = simulated, chamber = "queen", 
                        hours = 4, a = 1, b = 1, c = 1, d = 1, 
                        tau = tau, tau.pen = 0, n_mcmc = n_mcmc, delta_t = 1,
                        start = start, data_out =  paste("../data/", "sim_pen_MCMC", "-", 
                               log(i), "-", n_mcmc, ".csv", sep = ""))

```


```{r three state}
n_mcmc <- 5000
tau <- matrix( c(.1, 0, 
                 0, .1), nrow = 2, ncol = 2)
gamma <- rep(.002, 6)
X <- simulated3$state
lambda <- c(0, 0.06, .18)
start <- list(X = X, lambda = lambda, gamma = gamma)
i <- exp(-8)

run_model_3 <- DT_pen_mcmc(penalty = i, starts_data = simulated3$inter_persec, 
                        states = 3, ant_file = simulated3, chamber = "queen", 
                        hours = 1, a = 1, b = 1, c = 1, d = 1, e = 1, f = 1, 
                        tau = tau, tau.pen = 0, n_mcmc = n_mcmc, delta_t = 1,
                        start = start, data_out =  paste("../data/", "sim_pen_MCMC", "-", 
                               log(i), "-", n_mcmc, ".csv", sep = ""), 
                        osa_out = paste("../data/", "pen_OSA", "-", 
                               log(i), "-", n_mcmc, ".csv", sep = ""))

```
